mosinstall.author: DesignForJoomla.com

mosinstall.description:
D4J Instant Search Joomla extension utilize the power of AJAX technology and allows your Joomla website visitors to process searching and see the result instantly after typing the keyword. Instant Search can dramatically boost up your website performance as well as save the visitor time and traffic.

AJAX technology, which stands for Asynchronous JavaScript And XML, is a Web development technique for creating interactive web applications. The intent is to shift a great deal of interaction to the Web surfer's computer, exchanging data with the server behind the scenes, so that the entire Web page does not have to be reloaded each time the user makes a change.

D4J Instant Search Joomla extension is a great addition to your website. It can enhance both the performance and appearance. Just imagine how your website visitor will be surprised, when he types a keyword to search something and while he is thinking of that thing, it will be presented right in front of him.

For more information please take a visit to our website http://designforjoomla.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: persistent
param.label: Persistent Connection
param.description: The server connection method. If set to \'Yes\', only one connection will be created for all server call generated by typing a symbol of the keyword. If set to \'No\', new connections will be created for each server call. Setting \'No\' makes the search process faster, but requires more CPU usage.

param.name: show_option
param.label: Show Search Option
param.description: Whether or not to show search options

param.name: option_display
param.label: Search Option Display Type
param.description: The layout of search options presentation

param.name: option_pos
param.label: Search Option Position
param.description: The position of search options presentation

param.name: auto_refresh
param.label: Auto Refresh on Option Change
param.description: Whether or not to auto refresh search result on a search option change

param.name: width
param.label: Search Box Width
param.description: Size (in symbols) of the search text box

param.name: text
param.label: Default Text
param.description: The text appeared in the search text box, if left blank it will load _SEARCH_BOX from your language file

param.name: button
param.label: Search Button
param.description: Whether or not to display the Search Button

param.name: button_pos
param.label: Search Button Position
param.description: The position of the search button relatively to the search text box

param.name: button_text
param.label: Search Button Text
param.description: The text appeared in the search button, if left blank it will load _SEARCH_TITLE from your language file

param.name: showhideresult
param.label: Show/Hide Result Link
param.description: Whether or not to display Show/Hide Result link. This link toggles the visiblity of the search result popup window

param.name: showhideresult_text
param.label: Show/Hide Result Text
param.description: The text appeared as Show/Hide Result link

param.name: delay_time
param.label: Delay Time
param.description: The delay time in milisecond before searching.

param.name: chars_needed
param.label: Minimum Chars
param.description: The minimum amount of characters required to start the search process

param.name: keyword_length
param.label: Maximum Chars
param.description: The maximum length for a keyword

param.name: search_type
param.label: Search Type
param.description: The keyword analysis method when searching

param.name: ordering
param.label: Result Ordering
param.description: The presentation order of found items in the search result

param.name: result_length
param.label: Result Length
param.description: The maximum length of each found items presented in the search result

param.name: total_result
param.label: Results to Show
param.description: The number of first results to be shown in the search result

param.name: enable_sef
param.label: Enable SEF
param.description: Show result`s URL in SEF type or not?

param.name: display_type
param.label: Result Display Type
param.description: The presentation type of the search result. Field (Joomla like) or table (Mambo like)?

param.name: final_result
param.label: Show Only Final Result
param.description: If set to Yes, only final result will be displayed when user types continuously. This can save the CPU usage and bandwidth but may delay the display of search result.

param.name: result_navigation
param.label: The Result Page Navigation
param.description: Show < Start < Previous 1 2 3 ... n Next > End >> or not?

param.name: result_bgcolor
param.label: Result Box Background Color
param.description: The background color of result box (eg: #ff0000 for red, #00ff00 for green, #0000ff for blue, #ffffff for white, #000000 for black, etc.). If leave blank, the template`s background color will be used

param.name: result_width
param.label: Result Box Width
param.description: The width in pixels of the search result box

param.name: result_height
param.label: Result Box Height
param.description: The height in pixels of the search result box

param.name: padding_to
param.label: Padding To
param.description: The float position of the search result box relatively to browser window

param.name: padding_width
param.label: Padding Width
param.description: The space in pixes between the nearest edge of search result box and the selected window edge above

param.name: loading_status
param.label: Searching Status
param.description: Whether or not to show searching status string at top-right corner while seaching

param.name: loading_text
param.label: 'Searching...' string
param.description: The text for Searching Status. Default is \'Searching... Please wait...\'
